mapper.select: select ii.*, product.name product_name, product.scale product_scale, product.index product_index from ord_inventory_item ii, ent_product product where ii.sys_status = 1 and product.sys_status = 1 and ii.product_id = product.id and ii.inventory_id = #{id} order by product.index

select inventory.* from ord_inventory inventory where inventory.sys_status = 1
and inventory.inventory_date like "%${keyword}%"
order by if(isnull(inventory.modified_time),0,inventory.modified_time) desc,inventory.created_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into ord_inventory ( id, inventory_date, last_date, remarks, creator_id, created_time, modified_time ) values ( #{id}, #{inventory_date}, #{last_date}, #{remarks}, #{creator_id}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update ord_inventory set inventory_date = #{inventory_date}, last_date = #{last_date}, remarks = #{remarks} , modifier_id = #{modifier_id} , modified_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update ord_inventory set sys_status = 0, modifier_id = #{modifier_id}, modified_time = now() where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ord_inventory_item ( id, inventory_id, product_id, quantity, remarks, creator_id, created_time, modified_time ) values ( uuid(), #{inventory_id}, #{product_id}, #{quantity}, #{remarks}, #{creator_id}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update ord_inventory_item set quantity = #{quantity}, remarks = #{remarks} , modifier_id = #{modifier_id} , modified_time = now() where id = #{id}
